metadata.title: CVE-2023-52867 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/radeon: possible buffer overflow Buffer 'afmt_status' of size 6 couldoverflow, since index 'afmt_idx' is checked after access.

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-25.25').
linux-aws package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1015.15').
linux-azure package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1016.16').
linux-gcp package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1015.15').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
linux-laptop package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1011.14').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-25.25.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1018.18').
linux-raspi package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1012.15').
linux-starfive package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1009.10').
